metadata.title: CVE-2015-5607 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description:
Cross-site request forgery in the REST API in IPython 2 and 3.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5607` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ipython3 - 5.5.0-1
python3-ipython - 5.5.0-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ipython package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.5.0-1').
